info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 6:15PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Wasatch...southwestern Summit and north central Utah Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 615 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pleasant Grove, or 12 miles north of Provo, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Heber City, Orem, Lehi, Draper, Pleasant Grove, American Fork, Heber, Lindon, Alpine, Francis, Daniel, Vineyard, Wasatch Mountain State Park, Timber Lakes, Utah Lake, Highland, Cedar Hills, Midway, Charleston and Wallsburg. This includes the following highways... Interstate 15 between mile markers 273 and 278. US Route 40 between mile markers 11 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
